title: [Health] Despite having poor sleep quality highly engaged gamers seems to seem to display a healthy lifestyle consisting of regular physical activity, a healthy diet during gaming time, and an unproblematic gaming behavior, as well as an emotionally healthy profile and state of well-being

[Cancer] Study on more than 500,000 men and women in six American states found that living in an area with high levels of particulate air pollution was associated with an 8% increased incidence of breast cancer
